channel.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
channel.description:
# Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse
## Because explosions make everything better
![image|500x500](upload://56wSt2EFhj2Em57Xr7XBaacl5L6.jpeg)
### Hosts
Solic & Astand
### Setup
12 [color=green]Town[/color] 4 [color=red]Mafia[/color]
Mafia requires parity to win rather than the total obliteration of the town faction
Nightless Mafia have a factional chat, but do not have a factional kill Days are 48 hours long Prods will be sent out every 24 hours of non-activity. A second prod means a force replace out. Lynches happen through either majority or plurality Votes are cast with command **/vote [insert playername]** You cannot vote for a nolynch
### Game Gimmick
Each player has a bomb strapped to them, the bombs can only be disarmed when 1 faction wins.
At the beginning of the game, each player is publicly given a detonator.
At any point, you may type **/detonate** in the game thread to kill the player whose detonator you hold.
When a player dies for any reason (detonation or lynch), the detonator they hold is given to the player who holds their detonator, so if A can kill B and B can kill C, if B dies, A then has the detonator to kill C.
A player may detonate a maximum of one player per day.
Before the game starts, the Mafia must tell us if they want a Town detonator, a Mafia detonator, or for it to be random. A maximum of 3 Mafia detonators can be taken. A 12 hour time limit holds for pre-game. It is allowed to talk during this period. If no choice is made, it will be random.
Once the player who has your detonator types **/detonate** , you can no longer detonate anyone.
### Players Alive (A -> B = A can detonate B) Blizer -> Icibalus Icibalus -> Meteoro Meteoro -> DatBird DatBird -> H_Hjasik H_Hjasik -> MathBlade MathBlade -> Geyde Geyde -> Eevee Eevee -> Maxwell Maxwell -> Blizer
![image|482x500](upload://qbaclfNpon6EBisXFqCfQYV4Yr1.jpeg)
# Graveyard
1. orangeandblack5, [color=green]Town[/color] (Detonated first, day 1 by Blizer) 2. WazzaAzza, [color=green]Town[/color] (Detonated second, day 1 by BlueStorm) 3. Hippolytus, [color=red]Mafia[/color] (Detonated third, day 1 by H_Hjasik) 4. MaximusPrime, [color=green]Town[/color] (Detonated fourth, day 1 by Eevee) 5. Sam17z, [color=green]Town[/color] (Detonated fifth, day 1 by Firekitten) 5. Firekitten, [color=green]Town[/color] (Detonated sixth, day 1 by Geyde) 6. BlueStorm, [color=green]Town[/color] (Detonated seventh, day 1 by Maxwell)
Backups
1.
Type **/backup** to backup.
Credit for the setup goes to user Jazz.

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: Solic
item.description:
You had 3 mafia members alive. You were not dangerously close to losing. I think this is balanced, but maybe the detonator reset dynamics need some kind of tune.

Read full topic

We had 7 mislynches and were still dangerously close to losing

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
It’s kind of ironic:

In games going fast going slower usually wins.

In games going slow getting the first perception usually wins.

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: Maxwell
item.description:
Thanks for the complement. But there’s more I could have done. I just rando detonated BlueStorm because it seemed as if one of us would be lynched instead of fighting for both of us which may have worked.

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
You keep a very level head, which is one of the best qualities you’ve shown in this game.

About the activity thing, that’s just an unfortunate causality of games like this.

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: Maxwell
item.description:
Perhaps I should have. But these fuse games go so fast I miss an exorbitant amount of messages while in class. All in all I have over 1,500 unread messages in this thread.

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
That’s when imho you need to fight more newbie or not. While I was encouraging I wasn’t like “rah rah go Maxwell” and pushing you too.

If you think town is going the wrong way scream it. Even if it seems “ridiculous”

Read full topic
item.source: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win

item.description:
I trust your advice was valid Math. I sort of suspected who was who, and I knew town would just be trigger happy.

Read full topic

item.title: [FM] Short Fuse III: Shortest Fuse - Game End - Mafia win
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
And if I was town I probably would have become stubborn and 0 fucks in a different way. As either alignment I hate people asserting they know more than I do. It makes a person feel useless and unwanted which almost instantly makes me not want to work with that person.

Btw @Maxwell and @DatBird my advice for new players was still solid imho even though I was scum.

Read full topic
